TextBlock.Text: Slag: is a small moon or rather a cluster of chunks of the same moon that were ripped apart due to tidal forces.
these chunks are currently orbiting in the upper-most and thinnest layer of MagMag's atmosphere! how they aren't already long gone is beyond me.
and knowing that makes me being here even more reckless and stupid! so now it's time to record MagMag's analysis. to do that i'll go to Slag's underside.
yes that's stupid but i can't visit MagMag itself. i'm not "try to stand on lava" teir stupid
